pool-burn-reward: Reward you got from Burn Fund
pool-rule1: * When you withdraw, the contract will automagically claim DOMO for you!
pool-rule2: * A percent of Burning Fee in this pool is ranging from 18% to 0% with rate reducing hourly. Once per 24 hours, fees in Burning fund would be prorated to qualified accounts.
pool-rule3: * A percent of Burning Fee in this pool is ranging from 36% to 0% with rate reducing hourly. Once per 24 hours, fees in Burning fund would be prorated to qualified accounts.
pool-withdraw: Get your earned DOMO together with your deposit.
